name: Qi Guo
story: Niu Chen grew up in a small village in rural China. He joined the military at a young age and has served in various capacities ever since. Niu Chen is a skilled marksman and excels in reconnaissance missions. He is quiet and reserved, preferring to keep to himself rather than socializing with his fellow soldiers. Niu Chen is disciplined and takes his job very seriously, always striving to be the best at what he does.
